column4: Basically according to the man pages of dislocker, I should run dislocker-file but I only have dislocker in /usr/bin http://rpm.pbone.net/index.php3/stat/45/idpl/18547941/numer/1/nazwa/dislocker
I know, those are just the man pages. I installed it on Ubuntu http://www.hsc.fr/ressources/outils/dislocker/download/
actually, if it's not in the repos, it's not supported here, better contact the maintainer
